argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isabld.b | |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 2 |  | isabld.p | |- ( ph -> .+ = ( +g ` G ) ) |
| 3 |  | isabld.g | |- ( ph -> G e. Grp ) |
| 4 |  | isabld.c | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B /\ y e. B ) -> ( x .+ y ) = ( y .+ x ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_grpmnd | |- ( G e. Grp -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 6, 4 | #P_iscmnd | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 8 |  | #P_isabl | |- ( G e. Abel <-> ( G e. Grp /\ G e. CMnd ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 7, 8 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) |
